title: STAT+: Solicitor general urges Supreme Court to review ‘skinny labeling’ and generic drug access
description: In a closely watched case, the U.S. solicitor general has urged the Supreme Court to review a controversy over so-called skinny labels for medicines, arguing that an appeals court finding…
